revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Single-board Computer |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.cubietech.com/product-detail/cubieboard4/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Cubietech_Cubieboard_4 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Cubietech |model = Cubieboard |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = 4 |subrevision = V1.2 2014.12.03 |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Allwinner;A80; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_cores2 = 4 |cpu1_total_cores = 8 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A15 |cpu1_type2 = ARM |cpu1_type2_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 2.0 GHz |cpu1spd2 = 1.5 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Foresee;NCEFEH58-08G; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ4G63AFR-PBC; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211E; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 2.0 (OTG), Micro SD Card slot |exp_usb_num = 5 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 4 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 4 |pwr_barrel_inner = 1.7 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, |jtag = yes,,
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI 1.4, VGA, Audio 3.5mm out, Mic (3.5mm), IR receiver, Li-ion battery connector, Bluetooth 4.0, RTC w/ battery, I2C, |addchip = PMIC;X-Powers Limited;AXP806;;1;,,, PMIC for Battery Management;X-Powers Limited;AXP809;;1;,,, Audio Codec;X-Powers Limited;AC100;;1;,,, 3-Channel HD Video Encoding Circuit;Chengdu Zhenxin Tech;GM7123C;;1;,,, 4-port USB hub controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, 30V P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega;AO4435;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Android 4.4, Debian, Ubuntu
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 03/2015 |estprice = 125 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B07226D7LH |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AMPAK AP6330 |rad1modif = SDIO (module) |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4330; |rad1chip2 = Broadcom;BCM40183; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== This board is also referred to as '''CC-A80''' which is silkscreened on the PCB.
{{see also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Allwinner]]'' A80 Octa-core (4 Cores Cortex-A15 and 4 Cores Cortex-A7) *GPU: ''PowerVR'' G6230 *Memory: 2GB DDR3 @672MHz *Onboard Storage: 8GB eMMC, TF card (max. 64GB) / MMC card slot
==Links of Interest== *[http://cubieboard.org/model/cb4/ ''cubieboard4(CC-A80)'' on '''CubieBoard A series of open source hardware''' ] *[https://linux-sunxi.org/Cubietech_Cubieboard4 ''Cubietech Cubieboard4'' on '''Linux-Sunxi''' Wiki] *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cubieboard#Cubieboard_4 ''Cubieboard 4'' on '''Wikipedia''' ] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2014/10/21/buy-cubieboard-4-cc-a80-development-board/ ''AllWinner A80 based Cubieboard4 Development Board is Now Available'' on '''CNXSOFT''' ] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2015/04/01/cubieboard-4-ubuntu-review-setup-usability-and-performance/ ''Cubieboard 4 Ubuntu Review – Setup, Usability, and Performance'' on '''CNXSOFT''' ]
==See also== *[[Cubietech Cubietruck]] - ''Allwinner'' A20 2-cores ARM Cortex-A7 CPU @1.0GHz *[[Cubietech Cubieboard]] - ''Allwinner'' A10 1-cores ARM Cortex-A8 CPU @1.0GHz *[[Cubietech Cubieboard 2]] - ''Allwinner'' A20 2-cores ARM Cortex-A7 CPU @1.0GHz *[[Cubietech Cubieboard 3]] - ''Allwinner'' A20 2-cores ARM Cortex-A7 CPU @1.0GHz :Wi-Fi: [[Broadcom]] BCM4329, BT: [[Broadcom]] BCM40181, GbE [[Realtek]] RTL8211E *[[Cubietech Cubieboard 4]] - ''Allwinner'' A80 SoC (4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 and :4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 big.LITTLE), GPU: PowerVR G6230, Wi-Fi (2.4/5GHz) *[[Cubietech Cubieboard 5]] - ''Allwinner'' H8 8-cores ARM Cortex-A7 CPU @2.0GHz :GPU: PowerVR SGX544 @700MHz, Toshiba TC358777XBG, Wi-Fi (2.4/5GHz)
[[Category:English Documentation]]
